name: The Three Borketeers
description:
A 2D casual game wherein you get to play one of the three lovable and cute dogs that will protect the cat that's stuck in a tree against the swarm of wild animals! Each dog has its unique traits that will help you fend of incoming enemies!

Credits:

Romello Martin - Game Programmer

Kristoffer Lirazan - Game Programmer

Marty Sy - Game Programmer

Osias Bantug - Game Artist
